backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing IoT energy simulation: tracks footsteps, voltage, and battery level across hourly records, managing charging/redirecting/depleting modes with advanceTime, getRecords, and helper query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (sensor panel, AI decision panel, energy flow diagram, analytics charts) to their frontend component files, dependencies, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component's purpose and styling approach for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes, including card, sidebar, chart, and destructive color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, setting the page title to 'Smart AI Footstep Electricity Generation IoT Dashboard' and mounting the app at #root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the single DashboardLayout component as the entire application.
Card component displaying the current AI energy mode with explanation text, overcharge protection status indicator, and a scrollable log of the last 10 timestamped decisions from backend records.
Tabbed analytics card using Recharts to display a 24-hour hourly footstep bar chart, a voltage-over-time line chart, and a battery level trend line chart, all sourced from backend records.
Page header with a banner background image, scanline overlay, project title in Orbitron font with amber glow, and 'System Online' / 'AI Active' status badges.
Root layout component that composes the full dashboard UI, arranging header, simulation control, sensor/AI panels, energy flow diagram, analytics charts, and a footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/EnergyFlowDiagra: SVG-based animated diagram showing energy flow between footstep sensors, generator, battery, and devices, with active edges and node glow states driven by the current energy mode.
Card panel displaying live sensor readings (footsteps, voltage, battery level, and AI mode) fetched from the latest energy record, with color-coded badges and progress bars per mode.
frontend/src/components/SimulationContro: Control bar that lets users manually advance simulation time or enable auto-advance on a 4-second interval, showing current record count and pending state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor or identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login, logout, and identity persistence with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for fetching energy records, footstep data, current hour, and mutations for advancing time and adjusting energy mode.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Orbitron, Share Tech Mono, Inter), sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines CSS custom properties for a dark neon theme, and adds utility classes for glow effects, animations, and scanline overlays.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider, then mounts to the DOM root.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts (Orbitron, Share Tech Mono, Inter), oklch-based color tokens for a dark neon UI, neon glow box shadows, and keyframe animations; includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file describing the Smart AI Footstep Electricity Generation dashboard app, including its architectural notes, existing implemented features, known issues, and image requirements for the build planner.
